sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function Hero() { const [text, setText] = useState(''); const fullText = 'Aspiring Software Engineer'; const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { if (index < fullText.length) { const timeout = setTimeout(() => { setText(prev => prev + fullText[index]); setIndex(index + 1); }, 100); return () => clearTimeout(timeout); } }, [index]); return (

Hi, I'm Amit

{text}|

B.Tech CSE (Data Science) student at Lovely Professional University. Building scalable solutions with React, Node.js, Python, and modern web technologies.

View Projects Get In Touch
); } export default Hero;
